Text: is anybody else getting these out of love for moores original work, feeling let down by every single issue and yet keeps ongetting 'em..... or is that just me?
iam very thankful to you sir....

Thanks mdusanjay.  hrmschach, I have to admit that I kind of feel the same way.  I quite liked the Silk Spectre run , particularly the trippy issue 3.  Not as let down by these as much as the new "classic" Stars Wars run though, even with the Alex Ross covers.
new star wars is a load of bull...
